name: Protodroid Delta
storyline:
Dr. Shelton has finally created one of the first Protodroids - a droid with near-human levels of intelligence. DeLTA was made to "be the change," as her name suggests, that shows the world the promise of what AI can become. So Delta sets out to show the world that's she's more than 'just a robot' "
However, an attack on Dr. Shelton's lab by a Drone-Gang Dr. Shelton forces her to enable DeLTAs combat subroutines and hurriedly retrofit her with weapons systems in self-defense. After DeLTA successful fends off the attackers, Dr. Shelton realizes that just as DeLTA saved her and the lab she could defend the entire region again'st the rising Drone-Gang threat that is claiming so many civilian lives. And by doing this she will and earn the city’s belief and affection. And that this may be the be the best way to convince the world that she's "more than just a robot" and come to embrace the promise of what AI can become.
summary: Reach your potential in a fast and fluid 3D action-platformer set in a beautiful and hopeful Solarpunk world. Take on challenging bosses, upgrade your systems, and show humanity the promise of AI.
